divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my porch and looking up at the sky (I always do). Then it was like out of nowhere this odd shaped thing (which at first I thought it was some sort of falling material) I just watched as it flew over my house with no sound no light and no emission. This has not been the first time I've seen a ufo by my house but but this was very odd and was so much different then the others. Its hard to explain.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Woodbridge Township
There were no other sightings in Woodbridge Township on or around April 28th 2013
